synopsis.text: Nagisa Amami, a reserved 26-year-old office worker, finds herself in an unexpected journey to break free from her timid nature. Along her path, she crosses ways with Soushi Sazanami, a charismatic yakuza member adorned with captivating tattoos. Intrigued by his enigmatic charm, Nagisa finds herself spending an unforgettable night with him. As their connection deepens, Soushi's devotion to her is expressed both through his tender words and the art on his body. Will this passionate encounter between the virgin office lady and the gangster evolve into a lasting love story, or will it remain a fleeting moment in time? Prepare to be captivated by this dramatic tale of love, growth, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
